verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:1
verses.text: Am I not an apostle? am I not free? have I not seen Jesus Christ our Lord? are not ye my work in the Lord?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:2
verses.text: If I be not an apostle unto others, yet doubtless I am to you: for the seal of mine apostleship are ye in the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:3
verses.text: Mine answer to them that do examine me is this,

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:4
verses.text: Have we not power to eat and to drink?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:5
verses.text: Have we not power to lead about a sister, a wife, as well as other apostles, and as the brethren of the Lord, and Cephas?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:6
verses.text: Or I only and Barnabas, have not we power to forbear working?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:7
verses.text: Who goeth a warfare any time at his own charges? who planteth a vineyard, and eateth not of the fruit thereof? or who feedeth a flock, and eateth not of the milk of the flock?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:8
verses.text: Say I these things as a man? or saith not the law the same also?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:9
verses.text: For it is written in the law of Moses, Thou shalt not muzzle the mouth of the ox that treadeth out the corn. Doth God take care for oxen?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:10
verses.text: Or saith he it altogether for our sakes? For our sakes, no doubt, this is written: that he that ploweth should plow in hope; and that he that thresheth in hope should be partaker of his hope.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:11
verses.text: If we have sown unto you spiritual things, is it a great thing if we shall reap your carnal things?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:12
verses.text: If others be partakers of this power over you, are not we rather? Nevertheless we have not used this power; but suffer all things, lest we should hinder the gospel of Christ.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:13
verses.text: Do ye not know that they which minister about holy things live of the things of the temple? and they which wait at the altar are partakers with the altar?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:14
verses.text: Even so hath the Lord ordained that they which preach the gospel should live of the gospel.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:15
verses.text: But I have used none of these things: neither have I written these things, that it should be so done unto me: for it were better for me to die, than that any man should make my glorying void.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:16
verses.text: For though I preach the gospel, I have nothing to glory of: for necessity is laid upon me; yea, woe is unto me, if I preach not the gospel!

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:17
verses.text: For if I do this thing willingly, I have a reward: but if against my will, a dispensation of the gospel is committed unto me.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:18
verses.text: What is my reward then? Verily that, when I preach the gospel, I may make the gospel of Christ without charge, that I abuse not my power in the gospel.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:19
verses.text: For though I be free from all men, yet have I made myself servant unto all, that I might gain the more.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:20
verses.text: And unto the Jews I became as a Jew, that I might gain the Jews; to them that are under the law, as under the law, that I might gain them that are under the law;

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:21
verses.text: To them that are without law, as without law, (being not without law to God, but under the law to Christ,) that I might gain them that are without law.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:22
verses.text: To the weak became I as weak, that I might gain the weak: I am made all things to all men, that I might by all means save some.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:23
verses.text: And this I do for the gospel’s sake, that I might be partaker thereof with you.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:24
verses.text: Know ye not that they which run in a race run all, but one receiveth the prize? So run, that ye may obtain.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:25
verses.text: And every man that striveth for the mastery is temperate in all things. Now they do it to obtain a corruptible crown; but we an incorruptible.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:26
verses.text: I therefore so run, not as uncertainly; so fight I, not as one that beateth the air:

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:27
verses.text: But I keep under my body, and bring it into subjection: lest that by any means, when I have preached to others, I myself should be a castaway.
